name: I'm Broke Let's Deal
overview:
Ibld.com was created to help businesses in the service industry connect with potential customers and vice versa.

BUSINESSES: IBLD.com has many business features and tools. To begin the experience, create a profile for your service industry based company. You can create multiple business profiles and conveniently manage them under one account. By creating a profile, you are granted access to respond to consumer’s service based work ads that have been posted on imbrokeletsdeal.com. It is also possible for you to create a consumer profile.

You have the ability to specify a service location parameter. Once a service based ad is created by a consumer within the location area you have chosen, the ad will be automatically emailed to you within five minutes.

As a business, you also have the option to select the type of work ads you wish to receive by utilizing our tagging tool.

You can also do a manual search for consumer ads within the “need more work” section. Each job ad will be listed by zip code and service field. Once you find a job with an acceptable price, you have the ability to contact the consumer and offer to do the job.

The “deal of the day” feature can be used to send consumers current specials. Once you create a “deal of the day,” an email is automatically sent to consumers whose interests match the specific tags you chosen.

Once you have connected with the consumer and the requested work has been completed, you have the option to rate each consumer that you deal with and they also have the option to rate your business. For maximum quality of members, any business or consumer with too many negative reviews will be removed from imbrokeletsdeal.com.

CONSUMERS: As a consumer using IBLD.com, you also have many features and tools. To begin, create a consumer profile. Creating a profile grants you full access to imbrokeletsdeal.com. For added convenience, you will have the ability to also create a business profile and manage them under one account.

While you are creating a profile, you have the option to fill out your “interests” and you will be emailed a “deal of the day” based on those interests. “Deals of the day’ are specials created by businesses with profiles on imbrokeletsdeal.com. You have the ability to turn this feature off at anytime.

Once you have created an account and set your preferences, you are free to create an ad for the type of service work that you need done, the city you need work done in and the price you are willing to pay, in the “service based work” section. Along with the created ad in the forum, an automatic email will also be generated and sent to businesses with profiles on imbrokeletsdeal.com that may be able to fulfill your needs. This gives your ad maximum exposure.

A business that is able and willing to do the service work you need done at your specific price will have the immediate ability to contact you.

Once the required work has been completed, you have the option to rate each business that you deal with and they also have the option to rate you. Any consumer or business with too many negative reviews will be removed from imbrokeletsdeal.com.
